      • withAnimation

        public TooltipOptions withAnimation(boolean animation)
        Do we apply a css fade transition to the tooltip ?
        Parameters:
        animation -

      • withContainer

        public TooltipOptions withContainer(String container)
        Css selector defining the container where the tooltip will be appended. If the container is null (or empty string, the tooltip will be added after the element targeted by the tooltip.

        If the container is equals to 'parent', the tooltip will be appended to the parent element of the element.

        If the container is equals to 'element', the tooltip will be appended directly to the element. With this options, the tooltip is not hidden when the user hovers it.

        Parameters:
        container -

      • withContent

        public TooltipOptions withContent(String content)
        Content of the tooltip, if title attribute doesn't exist on the element
        Parameters:
        content -
